item.title: Jets trade Sauce Gardner to Colts: Last piece to Super Bowl puzzle? What's N.Y. thinking?
item.description: The 7-2 Colts are going all-in on a Super Bowl run, while trading the CB was just part of the Jets' busy day.

item.title: What does Quinnen Williams trade mean for Jets, Cowboys?
item.description: Jerry Jones made a big splash. Here is why it happened and how it affects both teams.

item.title: Cowboys acquire DT Williams in trade with Jets
item.description: The Jets have traded three-time Pro Bowl DT Quinnen Williams to the Cowboys in exchange for a second-round pick in 2026, a first-rounder in 2027 and D...

item.title: Colts add CB Gardner from Jets in blockbuster
item.description: The Colts pulled off a blockbuster trade ahead of Tuesday's deadline, acquiring All-Pro CB Sauce Gardner from the Jets for first-round picks in 2026 a...

item.title: Jags snag Meyers in deadline deal with Raiders
item.description: The Raiders have traded WR Jakobi Meyers to the Jaguars in exchange for fourth- and sixth-round draft picks.
